body_html:
To quantify the reduction in the PIP wheel file size (in bytes, for Python 3.5):
Before: 43691027
After: 43507664
About 180 kB (0.5% reduction).

Not as much as one would expect :) But it gets rid of 175 unnecessary files and about 2.5 MB disk space when installed.

body:
To quantify the reduction in the PIP wheel file size (in bytes, for Python 3.5):
Before: 43691027
After: 43507664
About 180 kB (0.5% reduction).

Not as much as one would expect :)  But it gets rid of 175 unnecessary files and about 2.5 MB disk space when installed.
